UninstallCmd:
Remove-ADTFolder -Path "C:\apps\client"
Remove-ADTFolder -Path "C:\Program Files (x86)\Oracle"
Remove-ADTFolder -Path "$envCommonStartMenuPrograms\Oracle - OraClient19Home1_32bit"
# Registry aufr?umen
Remove-ADTRegistryKey -Key "HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Oracle" -Recurse
Remove-ADTRegistryKey -Key "HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Wow6432Node\ORACLE" -Recurse
Remove-ADTRegistryKey -Key "HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\OracleRemExecServiceV2" -Recurse
# Gruppen entfernen
Get-LocalGroup ora* | Remove-LocalGroup

Remove-ADTFolder -Path "C:\apps\client"
Remove-ADTFolder -Path "C:\Program Files (x86)\Oracle"
Remove-ADTFolder -Path "$envCommonStartMenuPrograms\Oracle - OraClient19Home1_32bit"
# Registry aufr?umen
Remove-ADTRegistryKey -Key "HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Oracle" -Recurse
Remove-ADTRegistryKey -Key "HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Wow6432Node\ORACLE" -Recurse
Remove-ADTRegistryKey -Key "HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\OracleRemExecServiceV2" -Recurse
# Gruppen entfernen
Get-LocalGroup ora* | Remove-LocalGroup

InstallCmd:
# Add Read permission for Users
$appname = $adtSession.AppName
$appfolder = "C:\Program Files\WinGet\Packages\Microsoft.Sysinternals.ProcessExplorer_Microsoft.Winget.Source_8wekyb3d8bbwe\procexp.exe"
Start-ADTProcess -FilePath "icacls.exe" -ArgumentList "`"$appfolder`" /grant *S-1-5-32-545:R"  -WindowStyle 'Hidden'
New-ADTShortcut -Path "$envCommonStartMenuPrograms\$appname.lnk" -TargetPath "$appfolder\rdcman.exe" -IconLocation "$appfolder\rdcman.exe" -Description $appname -WorkingDirectory $appfolder

# Add Read permission for Users
$appname = $adtSession.AppName
$appfolder = "C:\Program Files\WinGet\Packages\Microsoft.Sysinternals.RDCMan_Microsoft.Winget.Source_8wekyb3d8bbwe\rdcman.exe"
Start-ADTProcess -FilePath "icacls.exe" -ArgumentList "`"$appfolder`" /grant *S-1-5-32-545:R"  -WindowStyle 'Hidden'
New-ADTShortcut -Path "$envCommonStartMenuPrograms\$appname.lnk" -TargetPath "$appfolder\rdcman.exe" -IconLocation "$appfolder\rdcman.exe" -Description $appname -WorkingDirectory $appfolder
